hooks.command: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const input = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(0, 'utf-8')); const projectDir = process.env.CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR || process.cwd(); const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-').slice(0, -5); const exportDir = path.join(projectDir, '.claude', 'exports'); fs.mkdirSync(exportDir, {recursive: true}); const targetPath = path.join(exportDir, \`conversation-\${timestamp}.jsonl\`); fs.copyFileSync(input.transcript_path, targetPath); console.log(\`Conversation exported to: \${targetPath}\`);"
